short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ambuli - Launches Digital Dictionories of South Asia for the selected word

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NO ADs and NO TRACKING. (This Extension DOES NOT TRACK YOU)
This extension helps you lookup a word using the DDSA Dictionaries. If you highlight the word and right click, you will see Ambuli, which will have submenus to lookup a word using the DDSA Dictionaries.
